title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons appear to be too small. b. When the dialog is opened, no table entry is automatically selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing the parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog appears oversized for methods with many parameters.
